job.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
job.description: pNeed to participate in the following activitiespp 1 Requirement Gathering and Analysis Analyse functionalnonfunctional requirements and seek clarifications for better understanding of requirements Define timeline estimates based on the requirementspp 2 Design Preparation of technical specification document and review the samepp 3 Coding Follow coding standards and best practices to check code quality Conduct technical troubleshootingpp 4 Testing Perform Unit testing and coordinate with QA team during the testing phasepp5 Knowledge Management Create specific artifacts for tasks allocated by supervisor Apply best practices learning during development activitiespp6strongSpanishnbspfluency is the requirement with the ability to follow phone flows alongside an Englishspeaking QA testerstrongp
